ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:420)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:421)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55210-9" Geotemporal History (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:422)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:1287)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:423)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:424)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3201 Geographical Location History STATIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:425)
